title: Did an Italian economist get removed from an airplane to do the math that looked like "terrorism"?
subtitle: In 2016, the economist Guido Menzio was escorted from a trip because the passenger next to him felt his differential equations.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: Guido Menzio, an Italian economist, was removed from an airplane because one passenger believed that the math problems he was working on seemed suspicious.
